events.message: The candidate submitted their application for the Software Engineer position through our online portal, demonstrating a strong interest in the role and relevant skills.
Application was reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster due to mentions of software development and engineering experience in the candidateâ€™s resume.
Recruiter assigned to the candidate promptly to initiate the screening process, ensuring timely follow-up and maintaining candidate engagement.
Conducted initial phone screening with the candidate to assess basic technical knowledge and cultural fit, receiving positive responses and enthusiasm about the role.
Candidate responded promptly with availability for a technical interview, showing strong interest and flexibility, which reflects well on their commitment.
Technical interview was scheduled efficiently for the following week, coordinating between interviewer and candidate to find a suitable time slot.
Candidate completed the technical interview showing strong problem-solving skills and deep knowledge in software engineering principles, scoring well on assessment criteria.
